entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 07 February 2023
